mapper.sql: PLAN_REUSE_ID, USER_ID, PLAN_REUSE_NAME, ADD_TIME, TIME_START_TIME, DELETE_TIME, IS_EFFECTIVE, SCENARIO_NAME, MISSION_NAME, AREA_NAME, OLD_PLAN_ID, TIME_END_TIME
mapper.select: select PLAN_REUSE_ID,PLAN_REUSE_NAME,ADD_TIME,TIME_START_TIME,SCENARIO_NAME,MISSION_NAME,AREA_NAME,TIME_END_TIME from T_PLAN_REUSE where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=OTHER} and IS_EFFECTIVE='1'
mapper.insert: insert into T_PLAN_REUSE (PLAN_REUSE_ID, USER_ID, PLAN_REUSE_NAME, ADD_TIME, TIME_START_TIME, DELETE_TIME, IS_EFFECTIVE, SCENARIO_NAME, MISSION_NAME, AREA_NAME, OLD_PLAN_ID, TIME_END_TIME, PROVINCE_CODES, CITY_CODES, COUNTY_CODES ) values (#{planReuseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{planReuseName,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{timeStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isEffective,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scenarioName,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{missionName,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{areaName,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{oldPlanId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{timeEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{provinceCodes,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{cityCodes,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{countyCodes,jdbcType=CLOB} )

mapper.update:
update T_PLAN_REUSE
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PLAN_REUSE_NAME = #{planReuseName,jdbcType=OTHER},
ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TIME_START_TIME = #{timeStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_EFFECTIVE = #{isEffective,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENARIO_NAME = #{scenarioName,jdbcType=OTHER},
MISSION_NAME = #{missionName,jdbcType=OTHER},
AREA_NAME = #{areaName,jdbcType=OTHER},
OLD_PLAN_ID = #{oldPlanId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TIME_END_TIME = #{timeEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PROVINCE_CODES = #{provinceCodes,jdbcType=CLOB},
CITY_CODES = #{cityCodes,jdbcType=CLOB},
COUNTY_CODES = #{countyCodes,jdbcType=CLOB},
where PLAN_REUSE_ID = #{planReuseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_PLAN_REUSE set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PLAN_REUSE_NAME = #{planReuseName,jdbcType=OTHER}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TIME_START_TIME = #{timeStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_EFFECTIVE = #{isEffective,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCENARIO_NAME = #{scenarioName,jdbcType=OTHER}, MISSION_NAME = #{missionName,jdbcType=OTHER}, AREA_NAME = #{areaName,jdbcType=OTHER}, OLD_PLAN_ID = #{oldPlanId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TIME_END_TIME = #{timeEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROVINCE_CODES = #{provinceCodes,jdbcType=CLOB}, CITY_CODES = #{cityCodes,jdbcType=CLOB}, COUNTY_CODES = #{countyCodes,jdbcType=CLOB} where PLAN_REUSE_ID = #{planReuseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
